original_title: 夫の親友に犯され感じてしまった私… 通野未帆
overview: It's been four years since I got married... My conversation with my husband has decreased, and the number of misunderstandings has increased. One night her husband came home with her best friend Aoi. When she was praised for her home cooking, she felt happy for the first time in a long time...everything changed. Suddenly, her drunken husband grabbed me, and I was fucked without knowing why. Even though I should have been raped... The pleasure of being a 'woman' that I had forgotten for a long time welled up... When I realized I was also looking for Mr. Aoi...
title: I Really Love Being Fucked By My Husband's Best Friend!... Mino Tsuno
